page.text: This plugin is not implemented. It's only here, to populate the menus a little. Did you notice, that all plugins are constructed at runtime and on the fly from XML-files? Try Analyse->Means->T-Tests->Independent Samples T-Test or Analyse->Descriptive Statistics.
